name: Comic Exit
description:
✨This project was created for the Murcia Game Jam 2022✨  

Another commission... I have even finished the last one! This  comic about Onyx, the gnome is giving me a headache. Could I said "Oh, sorry my dog eat my commission" or it is too old-ish? Shall do I work on another excuse?  I'm just to tired...but I have to finish at least this chapter, let's see, where was I?

Got it.

Other day at Santa's office... zzz...he was working near to the fire place... zzz... Durn it! I MUST NOT FALL ASLEEP. I just need a coffe and a cigarrett, or maybe just a cigarrett. Rechapter... he wanted to make a new toy... zzz...

Entering to the dreaming world of Cerillo, the comic artist.

Cerillo has just felt asleep and now he is inside the comic, in fact, he is Onyx. A fire has started because the cigarret he forgot to put it out. Now he has to run for his life and make it outside the comic. Will he get out before the last page burns?

✨ HOW TO PLAY?

Try to exit before the fire gets you! Cross the grey areas until you find the exit, those are breaks between vignettes, there are some invisible doors!

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Spacebar

DEVELOPMENT TEAM

  • 2D Artist: Tiwhy 
  • Game Designer:  Nemesis
  • Music and Sound Designer: Mega Milo
  • Programmer: Sebas
